title: Tobias Anton
text:
With a big passion of telling stories with data, I’m especially interested in data visualisation and the psychological and perceptual pitfalls thereof. Apart from that I just enjoy the collaborative storytelling that are tabletop and pen & paper RPGs.


M. Sc. Cogntive Science | Artificial Intelligence & Cognitive Psychology
Universität Osnabrück | Oct 2018 - Dec 2022
B. Sc. Psychology | Work- and Organisational Psychology and Neuroscience
Universität Bremen | Oct 2014 - June 2018



Advanced Bayesian Data Analysis | Tutor / Research Assistant | April 2021 - Sept 2021
Quantitative Methods I & II | Tutor / Lecturer | Oct 2015 - Sept 2018

title: R Packages

title: R Packages
text:
ddateR
Hail Eris! A perpetual date converter from the gregorian to the poee calendar. Basically an R implementation of the ddate function from util-linux.
